title: fried squid with chilli and basil
description: Preparing squid is easy if you follow Ken Hom’s simple instructions. Flash-fried with chillies, basil and oyster sauce it makes a fabulous, yet speedy supper.
ingredients: 450g/1lb squid, fresh or frozen (defrosted if frozen)
2-3 small red Thai chillies, seeds removed, chopped
handful fresh Thai or ordinary basil leaves
